record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - July 27, 2007)

[Page: H8812]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I was absent from the Chamber for rollcall votes 748, 749, 750, 751, 752, 753, 754, 755, 756, and 757 on July 27, 2007. Had I been present, I would have voted "aye" on rollcall votes 748, 749, 751, 752, 754, 756, and 757, and I would have voted "no" on rollcall votes 750, 753, and 755.
